attributes.action: Cancel the contract for Airbust KC-30s and buy more L-1011s to replace the RAF's VC10s and KC-135s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The RAF's KC-30 program is called FSTA - Future Srategic Tanker Aeroplanes, but RAF personnel refers to it as 'F****** short of tankers again', and for a good reason - not a single KC-30 has been delivered yet. We must choose a different contractor. L-1011s could have been chosen for a fraction of the cost of the KC-30 program.
